revised_title: Two-Dimensional Finite-Element Model for River Flow Inundation: Improving Flood Simulation
tldr: The authors present a two-dimensional finite-element model for simulating river flow inundation over reach lengths of 10-30 km, addressing the limitations of current one-dimensional models. The new model incorporates lateral velocity components, turbulence, and complex topography, providing a more accurate representation of river channels and floodplains.
